boardgame.name: Spyrium
boardgame.description: Spyrium is set in an alternate world, an England set in a steampunk-based universe. Players build factories, needing workers to manage the production of a commodity previously unknown to us called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Spyrium_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. Producing Spyrium in one factory, then processing it in the next results in victory points (VPs) for that particular player. Alternatively, Spyrium can be purchased, but the material is rare and expensive, and players are constantly scraping for money._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Only those who from the beginning of the game manage to increase their regular income or their base of permanently employed workers (who can be used again and again to raise money) will be flexible enough to get their hands on the important end-of-game buildings to generate many VPs._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The circular nature of the game is flexible as each player can decide for himself when to move out of the placement phase and into the activation phase. With the two tracks in the game, those involved with delivery during the worker phase can then be used to raise money, to purchase an adjacent card, or to work on their own in an idle factory. All of these things are important, but in the end only the player who has dealt best with the lack of money, workers, and Spyrium will win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Multi-player Nominee

Asmodee (ASMSPYR01) What will be your strategy...produce or buy? Based in an imaginary world where England has been transformed into a Steampunk atmosphere. Your goal? Build factories, using workers who produce a substance known as Spyrium. Producing Spyrium in one factory, then processing it in the next results in victory Points. An alternative to producing Spyrium is buying it, however, players will need to work very hard to purchase the rare and expensive commodity. Only those who succeed from the beginning of the game to increase their income or workers will manage to offer the most lucrative factories will win!

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 3 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Money Order - We will accept postal money orders but will not ship until we have received and cashed the money order. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. I will only charge the actual USPS or UPS (your choice) shipping price (lowest possible) with delivery confirmation for the game. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. The cards are sleeved and the game has been played but is in excellent condition. Feel free to browse through my other games for sale in the marketplace. I will be glad to combine orders to save on shipping.

Asmodee (ASMSPYR01) What will be your strategy... produce or buy? Based in an imaginary world where England has been transformed into a Steampunk atmosphere. Your goal? Build factories, using workers who produce a substance known as Spyrium. Producing Spyrium in one factory, then processing it in the next results in victory Points. An alternative to producing Spyrium is buying it, however, players will need to work very hard to purchase the rare and expensive commodity. Only those who succeed from the beginning of the game to increase their income or workers will manage to offer the most lucrative factories will win!
